name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: Do you remember the smile on the little girl's face when Frosty the Snowman came back to life? Well, that's kind of how I felt today when the honorable Mayor Rob Ford returned to the city of Toronto.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: It's always a great day for a city when their mayor comes back from rehab.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: We're now down to the final 38 weeks of the World Cup.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: This morning when France played Nigeria, it was the first time an American referee ever officiated a knockout round match. The French won it by a touchdown.
